summary: Highly enthusiastic customer service professional with 10 years of client interface experience; dedicated to maintaining customer satisfaction and contributing to company success. Excellent communication and conflict-resolution skills; strong abilities in inventory control, data integrity, cash handling, and banking/financial services; detail-oriented and capable of cross-functional teamwork.

experience.title: Customer Service Representative
experience.description: Maintained up-to-date knowledge of store policies; prevented store losses; exceeded daily credit card application goals; cross-trained and provided back-up for other representatives; performed cashier duties; interacted with customers and retail buyers; followed up on shipping statuses and expedited orders.

experience.title: Administrative Assistant
experience.description: Managed receptionist area, drafted meeting agendas, organized electronic and paper files, handled correspondence, prepared reports and presentations, and supported daily office operations.

experience.title: Licensed Insurance Agent
experience.description: Interviewed prospective clients, promoted agency products, prepared paperwork for insurance sales/renewals, and developed leads to meet monthly targets.

experience.title: Personal Banker
experience.description: Opened new customer accounts; balanced daily cash deposits; assisted tellers; identified investment opportunities.

experience.title: Senior Financial Representative
experience.description: Opened new customer accounts and promoted bank services; balanced daily cash and vault inventory; resolved customer issues.

experience.title: Credit Card Specialist
experience.description: Addressed customer inquiries; built loyalty with follow-up calls; enforced service policies; improved call flow.

experience.title: Member Services Representative / Dispatcher
experience.description: Evaluated service locations and scheduling; negotiated contracts with outside providers; responded to customer inquiries; maintained records; supported management in enhancing customer satisfaction.

experience.title: Bank Teller
experience.description: Processed sales referrals; balanced deposits and vault inventory with zero errors; maintained confidentiality; delivered customer service.
